# GXC Miner Pro - Dependencies
# ============================

# GUI Framework
customtkinter>=5.2.0

# Plotting
matplotlib>=3.7.0

# System Monitoring
psutil>=5.9.0

# HTTP Requests (for RPC)
requests>=2.28.0

# Cryptography (optional, for Keccak)
pycryptodome>=3.18.0

# Build Tools (for development)
pyinstaller>=6.0.0
